Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Exempts the amount of any service award paid to any volunteer firefighter or ambulance worker from personal income tax
Summary: Exempts the amount of any service award paid to any volunteer firefighter or ambulance worker from personal income tax.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to exempting the proceeds from service award programs for volunteer firefighters and ambulance workers from personal income taxes
